name: Energy Gobbler
description:
This game was made for the ScoreSpace Game Jam. The goal of the game is to gain the highest possible score. Compete with others to see who can absorb the most energy. As you go on, you will encounter different and harder enemies.

Absorbing energy makes you a bigger target, and hitting enemies makes you incur damage.

Controls: 

Move: Left and Right Arrow keys or A/D

Some art was made by me using Gimp, and some art is from Kenney. Sound Effects were made by me using Sfxr and Bosca Ceoil. All code was made during the jam.

LootLocker was used to implement online leaderboards.
